donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: Expanded Support Programme (ESP) in support of the Zimbabwe National HIV and AIDS response (The Common Fund) to scale up HIV coordination and management, prevention and care and treatment interventions in rural districts in Zimbabwe. With the goal of 60 000 patients in 36 districts on Antiretroviral Therapy.

project_descr: Expanded Support Programme (ESP) in support of the Zimbabwe National HIV and AIDS response (The Common Fund) to scale up HIV coordination and management, prevention and care and treatment interventions in rural districts in Zimbabwe
project_title: Expanded Support Program for National HIV/AIDS Response
